name: The human mind is a shit
name_original: The human mind is a shit
description:
One day you fall down and appear trapped on a lonely island along with a rubber duck (large quantities), a TV, a mailbox, a talking toaster and a lot of other nonsense. 

Explore, interact, burn things, make friends, do nothing and understand why: The human mind can be wonderful. 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Instructions

1- Download the rar

2- Unrar the rar

3- Put your headphones on 

4- Click in the duck

5- FALL  AND ENJOY

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is a small introspective project, done by one person. The aim of this is to get to know me and learn so that one day I can dedicate myself professionally to it.

If you think this game is worth playing, please share it and leave your opinion in the comments. Of course, if you have any questions too.  With these small actions you help me a lot to keep growing, something that I couldn't thank you enough.    

Thank you!!!!
